name: Give or Fight!
description: You are Adam, a young working professional, living in Metropolo, a modern city. You have a woman in your life, Felicia, and you love her dearly. You got her a Christmas present, and you want to give to her on Christmas Eve. You make your way from your apartment to hers, but you are unaware of a terrible truth: all the greed in the world has turned people into zombies. All people want is to take or fight. You have to choose: give, or fight back. Get your girl her gift, young Adam. If you don't, it's the doghouse for you...and nobody likes the doghouse.
